data.eml:eml: First record of Albunea occulta (Boyko) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Albuneidae) from the Andaman Islands, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marimuthu, P., Kumaralingam, S., Jayaraj, K. A., Equbal, Jawed, Ganesh, T. (2015): First record of Albunea occulta (Boyko) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Albuneidae) from the Andaman Islands, India. Zootaxa 4027 (1): 135-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.1.7
